Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • Screen
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HighScoreScreen, InstructionsScreen, OptionScreen, PlayScreen, UpgradeScreen, WelcomeScreen

    public class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class handles all the interactive menues and Gui for my game, It detects where the mouse is and conveys this to my other classes, It displayes the backgrounds and buttons
    Author:
    elan
